thing-type.label: Haas and Sohn Pellet stove Binding Thing
thing-type.description: The binding for haassohnpelletstove communicates with a Haas and Sohn Pelletoven through the optional WLAN-Modul. More information can be found here: https://www.haassohn.com/de/ihr-plus/WLAN-Funktion

parameter.name: hostIP
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: Please add the IP Address of the WIFI Module of the Haas and Sohn oven here

parameter.name: hostPIN
parameter.label: PIN
parameter.description: Please add the PIN of your oven here. You can find it in the Menu directly in your oven.

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh Rate
parameter.description: How often the Pellet Stove should schedule a refresh after a channel is linked to an item. Temperature data will be refreshed according this set time in seconds. Valid input is 0 - 999.

channel-type.label: Is Temperature of the Stove
channel-type.description: Haas and Sohn Stove Binding to receive the Is Temperature as String

channel-type.label: Actual Mode of the Stove
channel-type.description: Haas and Sohn Stove Binding to receive the acutal Mode of the Stove as String

channel-type.label: Set Temperature for the Stove
channel-type.description: Haas and Sohn Stove Binding to Set the Target Temperature of the Stove as String

channel-type.label: On/Off for the Stove
channel-type.description: Haas and Sohn Stove Binding to turn the Stove On/Off as Switch
